def.dt: :something that has been done or achieved through effort :a result of hard work The discovery of DNA was a major scientific achievement. It was a great/extraordinary/remarkable achievement. Getting the project done on time was a real achievement.

:the act of achieving something a high level of artistic achievement [=accomplishment] :the state or condition of having achieved or accomplished something Tests measure students' academic achievement. [=measure how much the students have learned] The students were awarded (with) certificates of achievement. [=documents saying that they reached an academic goal] Repairing the car by himself gave him a real sense of achievement. [=a proud feeling of having done something difficult and worthwhile]
